Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 241 of 262 1952
LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross
1 Q. And these were huge properties with lots of staff; right?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. And there were lots of these properties?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. And they demanded constant upkeep and supervision; right?
6 A. Correct.
7 Q. And there were numerous renovation and building projects going on at any given time at this time period at these properties?
8
9 Q. And she dealt with the pilots like yourself; right?
10 A. Right. Yes.
11 Q. One of her responsibilities was, for example, approving your expenses?
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. And she approved your vacation time?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. So if there was a problem with the planes in any way, shape, or form, she was the point of contact for that kind of an issue; right?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. And she performed those roles for Epstein throughout the 1990s; right?
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. Now, you characterized her as Epstein's number 2, I think
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013519
